Articles.Content:
im going to need someone help to make the SABRE engine and someone to make a plugin that lets players have hybrid air brething rocket engines

Then, unfortunately, you're in the wrong section of the forums.

These kinds of things go into the Addon Request and Support.

Disregard that. I'm in the wrong section myself.

Sheesh. My face is kinda red now...

Venus I'll try to help, IF you apologize to the Forums and Mod Creator for stealing that mod...
